message.content:
cs.HC, cs.CY, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.CC 

The paper explores the relationship between science fiction and human-computer interaction (HCI) research, which falls under the category of human-centered computing (cs.HC). The paper also discusses topics related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI), human-robot interaction (cs.RO), and visions of computing and HCI (cs.CC). Additionally, the paper touches on issues related to cybernetics (cs.CY) as it discusses the modification and extension of the human body.
